languages.text: Занесенный над вами кулак хрустит от встречи с металлической дубинкой, и испуганный вскрик отдается эхом от стен отсека Тета-54. Прижав сломанное запястье к груди, блюстительница падает на колени и склоняет голову перед вставшей между вами фигурой. В тусклом свете люменов вы узнаете в своем защитнике одного из офицеров-пустотнорожденных с верхних палуб. За вами все же пришли! Офицер оглядывает ваши раны и стискивает зубы, занося дубинку над блюстительницей — сейчас тварь получит по заслугам!

traits.locale_text: Занесенный над вами кулак хрустит от встречи с металлической дубинкой, и испуганный вкрик отдается эхом от стен отсека Тета-54. Прижав сломанное запястье к груди, стражница падает на колени и склоняет голову перед вставшей между вами фигурой. В тусклом свете люменов вы узнаете в своем защитнике одного из офицеров-пустотнорожденных с верхних палуб. За вами все же пришли! Офицер оглядывает ваши раны и стискивает зубы, занося дубинку над стражницей — сейчас тварь получит по заслугам!

languages.text: The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. You have been rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!
languages.original_text: Занесенный над вами кулак хрустит от встречи с металлической дубинкой, и испуганный вскрик отдается эхом от стен отсека Тета-54. Прижав сломанное запястье к груди, блюстительница падает на колени и склоняет голову перед вставшей между вами фигурой. В тусклом свете люменов вы узнаете в своем защитнике одного из офицеров-пустотнорожденных с верхних палуб. За вами все же пришли! Офицер оглядывает ваши раны и стискивает зубы, занося дубинку над блюстительницей — сейчас тварь получит по заслугам!

traits.locale_text: The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the guard falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that's standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. Rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the guard. That scum's about to get her just deserts!

The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the guard falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that's standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. Rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the guard. That scum's about to get her just deserts!

The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the guard falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that's standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. Rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the guard. That scum's about to get her just deserts!

The fist raised above the Rogue Trader cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between the Rogue Trader and her. In the dim lumen light, the Rogue Trader recognises {mf|his|her} defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. The Rogue Trader has been rescued after all! The officer inspects the Rogue Trader's injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!

The fist raised above the Rogue Trader cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between the Rogue Trader and her. In the dim lumen light, the Rogue Trader recognises {mf|his|her} defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. The Rogue Trader has been rescued after all! The officer inspects the Rogue Trader's injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!

The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. You have been rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!

languages.text: 一根金属棒挥了过来，砸在了准备打向你的拳头上，把执法者的骨头都打裂了。惊恐的尖叫声响彻西塔54区的舱壁。那个执法者将断裂的手腕按在胸前，跪在地上，惊恐地看着你，还有站在你面前的那个人。在昏暗的灯光下，你认出了是谁在保护你，那是一位来自上层甲板的虚空之子军官。你终于得救了！那名军官检查了你的伤势，随后咬紧了牙，抄起棍子砸向了那个执法者。那个人渣马上就要得到她应得的报应了！
languages.original_text: The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. You have been rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!

traits.locale_text: 一根金属棒挥了过来，砸在了准备打向你的拳头上，把执法者的骨头都打裂了。惊恐的尖叫声响彻西塔54区的舱壁。那个执法者将断裂的手腕按在胸前，跪在地上，惊恐地看着你，还有站在你面前的那个人。在昏暗的灯光下，你认出了是谁在保护你，那是一位来自上层甲板的虚空之子军官。你终于得救了！那名军官检查了你的伤势，随后咬紧了牙，抄起棍子砸向了那个执法者。那个人渣马上就要得到她应得的报应了！

languages.text: El puño levantado contra ti cruje al chocar contra una porra de metal. Un chillido aterrado resuena entre los muros de Theta 54. Apretando su muñeca rota contra el pecho, la guardia cae de rodillas y agacha la cabeza frente a la figura que se interpone entre ella y tú. En la penumbra, reconoces a su defensor: uno de los oficiales nacidos en el vacío de las cubiertas superiores. ¡Han venido a rescatarte! El oficial inspecciona tus heridas y aprieta los dientes mientras alza la porra sobre la cabeza de la guardia. ¡Esa escoria va a recibir su merecido!
languages.original_text: The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. You have been rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!

traits.locale_text: El puño levantado contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente cruje al chocar contra una porra de metal. Un chillido aterrado resuena entre los muros de Theta 54. Apretando su muñeca rota contra el pecho, la guardia cae de rodillas y agacha la cabeza frente a la figura que se interpone entre ella y {mf|el|la} Comerciante. En la penumbra, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán reconoce a su defensor: uno de los oficiales nacidos en el vacío de las cubiertas superiores. ¡Han venido a rescatar{mf|lo|la}! El oficial inspecciona sus heridas y aprieta los dientes mientras alza la porra sobre la cabeza de la guardia. ¡Esa escoria va a recibir su merecido!

languages.text: あなたの上に掲げられた拳が、金属の棍棒に当たってひび割れる。苦痛の悲鳴がシータ54の壁に響き渡る。折れた手首を胸に押し当て、あなたと自分の間に立つ人物の前に、執行官は膝をついて頭を下げた。 薄暗い明かりの中で、あなたは味方がいるのを認識する。 上甲板の虚空生まれの士官だ。あなたは無事救助された！士官はあなたの怪我を確認すると、歯を食いしばりながら執行官に向かって棍棒を振り上げる。クズは報いを受けるがいい！
languages.original_text: The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. You have been rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの上に掲げられた拳が、金属の棍棒に当たってひび割れる。苦痛の悲鳴がシータ54の壁に響き渡る。折れた手首を胸に押し当て、ローグトレーダーと自分の間に立つ人物の前に、執行官は膝をついて頭を下げた。 薄暗い明かりの中で、ローグトレーダーは味方がいるのを認識する。 上甲板の虚空生まれの士官だ。ローグトレーダーは無事救助された！士官はローグトレーダーの怪我を確認すると、歯を食いしばりながら執行官に向かって棍棒を振り上げる。クズは報いを受けるがいい！

languages.text: Ihre erhobene Faust bricht, als sie auf eine metallene Keule trifft. Ein verängstigtes Kreischen halt von den Wänden von Theta 54 wider. Die Enforcerin hält ihre gebrochene Hand vor ihrer Brust, fällt auf die Knie und neigt den Kopf vor der Gestalt zwischen dir und ihr. Im düsteren Schein der Lumens erkennst du deinen Verteidiger ... einen Offizier von den Oberdecks, ein Kind der Leere. Endlich bist du gerettet! Der Offizier inspiziert deine Wunden, presst die Zähne zusammen und erhebt seine Keule über der Enforcerin. Jetzt bekommt das Miststück, was er verdient hat!
languages.original_text: The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. You have been rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!

traits.locale_text: Ihre erhobene Faust bricht, als sie auf eine metallene Keule trifft. Ein verängstigtes Kreischen halt von den Wänden von Theta 54 wider. Die Enforcerin hält ihre gebrochene Hand vor ihrer Brust, fällt auf die Knie und neigt den Kopf vor der Gestalt zwischen dir und ihr. Im düsteren Schein der Lumens erkennst du deinen Verteidiger ... einen Offizier von den Oberdecks, ein Kind der Leere. Endlich bist du gerettet! Der Offizier inspiziert deine Wunden, presst die Zähne zusammen und erhebt seine Keule über der Enforcerin. Jetzt bekommt das Miststück, was er verdient hat!

Die Faust, die sich in die Luft über {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} erhoben hat, kracht laut, als sie auf eine metallene Keule trifft. Ein verängstigtes Kreischen halt von den Wänden von Theta 54 wieder. Die Enforcerin hält ihre gebrochene Hand vor ihrer Brust, fällt auf die Knie und neigt den Kopf vor der Gestalt, die zwischen {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und ihr steht. Im düsteren Schein der Lumens erkennt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} {mf|seinen|ihren} Verteidiger: Es ist ein Offizier von den Oberdecks, ein Kind der Leere. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wurde doch noch gerettet! Der Offizier inspiziert die Wunden {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, presst die Kiefer zusammen und erhebt seine Keule über die Enforcerin. Dieser Abschaum bekommt jetzt, was er verdient hat!

languages.text: Un craquement sinistre se fait entendre lorsqu'une matraque métallique percute le poing levé sur vous. Un cri de terreur résonne entre les murs de Thêta 54. Appuyant son poignet brisé contre sa poitrine, le prévote tombe à genoux et baisse la tête devant la silhouette qui se trouve entre elle et vous. Dans le faible éclairage, vous reconnaissez la personne qui a pris votre défense : il s'agit de l'un des officiers hors-monde des ponts supérieurs. On est enfin venu à votre secours ! L'officier inspecte vos blessures et serre les dents alors qu'il lève sa matraque au-dessus de la prévote. Cette vermine va avoir ce qu'elle mérite !
languages.original_text: The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. You have been rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!

traits.locale_text: Un craquement sinistre se fait entendre lorsqu'une matraque métallique percute le poing levé sur vous. Un cri de terreur résonne entre les murs de Thêta 54. Appuyant son poignet brisé contre sa poitrine, le prévote tombe à genoux et baisse la tête devant la silhouette qui se trouve entre elle et vous. Dans le faible éclairage, vous reconnaissez la personne qui a pris votre défense : il s'agit de l'un des officiers hors-monde des ponts supérieurs. On est enfin venu à votre secours ! L'officier inspecte vos blessures et serre les dents alors qu'il lève sa matraque au-dessus de la prévote. Cette vermine va avoir ce qu'elle mérite !

languages.text: Suratına inmek üzere olan yumruk, metal copla karşılaşınca bir çatlama sesi çıkarıyor. Thita 54'ün duvarlarında korkmuş bir çığlık yankılanıyor. Kırık bileğini göğsüne bastıran infazcı, dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor ve seninle kendisi arasına geçen figürün önünde başını eğiyor. Loş lümen ışığında kurtarıcını tanıyorsun: Üst güvertelerden, uçsuzdoğan bir subay. Sonunda kurtarılıyorsun! Subay, yaralarını inceliyor ve dişlerini sıkarak copunu tekrar infazcıya doğru kaldırıyor. Aşağılık yaratık, hak ettiğini bulacak!
languages.original_text: The fist raised above you cracks as it meets a metal club. A frightened shriek echoes off the walls of Theta 54. Pressing her broken wrist to her chest, the enforcer falls to her knees and lowers her head before the figure that is standing between you and her. In the dim lumen light, you recognise your defender: one of the voidborn officers from the upper decks. You have been rescued after all! The officer inspects your injuries and clenches his teeth as he raises his club over the enforcer. That scum is about to get her just deserts!
